[[W Channel (Australia)|W.]] | timeshift names = | web = [http://www.historychannel.com.au/ historychannel.com.au] | sat serv 1 = [[Foxtel]] | sat chan 1 = Channel 606 | cable serv 1 = [[Foxtel]] | cable chan 1 = Channel 606 | sat serv 2 = [[Austar]] | sat chan 2 = Channel 606 | cable serv 2 = [[Austar]] | cable chan 2 = Channel 606 }} '''History''', formerly known as '''Fox History''' and '''The History Channel''', is a television channel in Australia and New Zealand, that broadcasts programs regarding [[History|historical]] events and persons, as well as various [[metaphysics|metaphysical]], [[Pseudoscience|pseudoscientific]], and [[paranormal]] phenomenaâoften with observations and explanations by noted [[historian]]s, scholars, authors, [[Esotericism|esotericist]]s, [[Astrology|astrologers]], and Biblical scholars as well as [[historical reenactment|reenactments]] and interviews with witnesses, and/or families of witnesses. The channel is operated by [[Foxtel|Foxtel Management Pty Limited]], and the programming and name of the channel is licensed to them by [[A&E Television Networks]]. It started out as ''Fox History'' in 1996, and changed its name to ''The History Channel'' in November 1998.{{cite web|url=http://www.acma.gov.au/webwr/aba/newspubs/radio_tv/investigations/documents/general/paytvdocs.pdf|title=Investigation into Expenditure Requirement for Pay TV Documentary Channels|publisher=Australian Broadcasting Authority}}{{cite web|url=http://www.aetninternational.com/content/sales/client_list.doc|title=The History Channel}} The channel used share its frequency with Fox Kids until December 2000, when it got its own 24 hour channel.{{cite journal | journal = [[Hollywood Reporter]] | title = New pay TV offerings from Australia's Foxtel.| first = Blake | last = Murdoch | section = | page = 10 | volume = 365| issue = 43 |issn = 0018-3660 | date = 28 November 2000 | accessdate = 2 May 2010 | url = http://allbusiness.com/services/motion-pictures/4829937-1.html}} ==References== {{reflist}} {{A&E Television Networks}} {{Foxtel}} {{Subscription television channels in Australia}} [[Category:Australian television channels|History Channel]] [[ms:History (saluran TV Australia)]]
